title: Greek Lemon Chicken and Potatoes Recipe
description: This Greek lemon chicken dish with crispy roast potatoes flavored with garlic, lemon, and oregano is one of Chef John's favorite chicken recipes.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Never lose a recipe:¬†Join MyRecipes to save and find favorites from AR & beyond Recipes Main Dishes Chicken Lemon Chicken Recipes Greek Lemon Chicken and Potatoes 4.8 (1,366) 1,023 Reviews 280 Photos This Greek lemon chicken dish with garlic and roast potatoes is a classic recipe and easy to cook in one roasting pan. The lemony crispy chicken is a proven crowd-pleaser, easy on the wallet, and a favorite of mine. By John Mitzewich John Mitzewich John Mitzewich ‚Äî aka Chef John ‚Äî has produced more than 1,500 cooking videos for Allrecipes.¬†He's the actor, director, and screenwriter whose hands and voice confidently walk you through techniques. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on March 27, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 280 280 280 280 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 50 mins Total Time: 1 hr Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 4 pounds skin-on, bone-in chicken thighs 3 medium russet potatoes, peeled and quartered ¬Ω cup freshly squeezed lemon juice ¬Ω cup Greek olive oil 6 cloves garlic, minced 1 tablespoon dried oregano 1 tablespoon kosher salt 1 teaspoon dried rosemary 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper 1 pinch cayenne pepper 1 cup chicken broth, divided 1 teaspoon chopped fresh oregano, or to taste Directions Gather all ingredients and preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Lightly oil a large roasting pan. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Place chicken and potatoes in a large bowl. Add lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, dried oregano, salt, rosemary, black pepper, and cayenne. Toss until chicken and potatoes are evenly coated. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Place chicken pieces skin-side up in the prepared pan. Tuck potato pieces around chicken. Drizzle with 2/3 cup chicken broth. Spoon any remaining marinade from the bowl over chicken and potatoes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Toss chicken and potatoes, then place chicken skin-side up again. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Continue baking until chicken is browned and cooked through, about 25 minutes more; an instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should register 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Transfer chicken to a serving platter and keep warm; leave potatoes in the pan. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Turn on the broiler, or set oven to highest heat. Toss potatoes again to coat in pan juices. Place the pan under the broiler and broil until potatoes are crisped, about 3 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Transfer potatoes to the platter with chicken. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Place the roasting pan on the stovetop over medium heat. Add the remaining 1/3 cup chicken broth and scrape up browned bits from the bottom of the pan. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Strain pan juices into a measuring cup and pour over chicken and potatoes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Sprinkle with fresh oregano. Serve and enjoy! Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 2,604 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 1139 Calories 75g Fat 35g Carbs 80g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 1139 % Daily Value * Total Fat 75g 96% Saturated Fat 17g 85% Cholesterol 284mg 95% Sodium 1866mg 81% Total Carbohydrate 35g 13% Dietary Fiber 3g 11% Total Sugars 2g Protein 80g 161% Vitamin C 26mg 28% Calcium 93mg 7% Iron 6mg 36% Potassium 1428mg 30% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Greek Lemon Chicken and Potatoes 01 of 280 Photo by¬† Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 280 Photo by¬† Queen 04/10/2025 A keeper! Great flavors Easy to follow Crowd-pleaser Amazing 03 of 280 Photo by¬† Sean Marquantte 02/06/2025 Might try again Had to do this recipe a little different as I'm cooking for 1 and had bnls/sknls chicken thighs that were already lemon pepper in store (4). For the recipe I used the juice of 2 lemons, 2/3rds cup olive oil divided, petite gold potatoes halved. After the suggested cooking time potatoes were perfect with a little color, chicken was done but needed more color. Instead of finishing in broiler, heated up a skillet and finished on stove top. While chicken and potatoes were browning on medium high, used the half of the chicken broth to de glaze pan that was in oven, poured over the chicken and potatoes and let thicken a little bit. Plated the chicken split into containers. It was hard to resist eating the potatoes! I'd recommend doubling the amount of lemon juice and maybe marinate the chicken and potatoes a little bit before throwing in the oven to get more lemon taste. 04 of 280 Photo by¬† Donna Root Hollister Workman 06/21/2024 A keeper! Great flavors Worth the effort Family favorite Followed the recipe and it was delicious!We served it with a Greek salad recipe that we found on this app. We definitely will be making this again. 05 of 280 Photo by¬† RowdyBeef1389 06/01/2024 Worth the effort Just made this‚Ä¶The entire family loved it!(The pic is before the potatoes went under the broiler) 06 of 280 Photo by¬† Rene Lafayette 04/16/2024 A keeper! Great flavors Easy to follow The comment of another reviewer to omit the cayenne pepper "because Greeks don't use it" resonated so I did not use it. I cut the potatoes per the recipe into quarters, the result was perfect. At the end I deglazed the pan with white wine and added a pat of butter. 07 of 280 Photo by¬† Aquinn 01/04/2024 We‚Äôve made this twice now and it‚Äôs been added to the rotation! I did make some changes based off of other reviews. I cut the oil and chicken broth back to 1/4 cup each. Also, I just throw all the seasonings/liquids together in the roasting pan, then add the chicken and potatoes in mix it all up and throw it in the oven. We‚Äôve used both gold and red potatoes halved, rather than russet. At the end, I just broil it until slightly browned and serve it then, cutting out the last steps so it‚Äôs a one pan dish! I love lemon and it‚Äôs very well balanced. 08 of 280 Photo by¬† Tina Ladd Brown 08/14/2023 Loved this recipe, I used boneless skinless chicken breast instead, and everything came out wonderful. 09 of 280 Photo by¬† alyse2232 07/17/2023 Took be back to the days I worked at the Greek diner. üëçDid not need to broil (chicken was done and potatoes were soft and didn't have extra time) but would be more brown if you did. 10 of 280 Photo by¬† SweetBroth3410 06/18/2023 I have made this twice now but I do double the recipe and it has come out delicious. It‚Äôs become a family favorite, I don‚Äôt add the chicken broth at all. It would be too much liquid, I also do bake it a little longer than the recipe calls for. 1 2 3 4 5 Next You‚Äôll Also Love Lemon-Roasted Chicken 92 Ratings Greek Lemon Chicken and Potato Bake 884 Ratings Lemon-Garlic Chicken Thighs and Potatoes 1 Rating Baked Lemon Butter Chicken Thighs 156 Ratings Greek Lemon-Garlic Chicken Thighs and Potatoes 16 Ratings Harvey's Moroccan Roast Chicken 41 Ratings Simple Lemon-Baked Chicken 147 Ratings Roast Chicken by Kevin Sbraga 9 Ratings Roast Chicken with Lemon, Garlic, and Rosemary 6 Ratings Butterflied Roast Chicken with Lemon and Rosemary 23 Ratings 9 Lemon Garlic Chicken Recipes You Can't Help But Love Baked Lemon-Basil Pasta 163 Ratings Roasted Lemon Herb Chicken 743 Ratings Lemon-Pepper Roast Chicken 1 Rating Grilled Spatchcocked Greek Chicken 5 Ratings Roasted Beer Butt Lime Chicken 9 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices ¬† Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith¬†publishing¬†family.
